Title: Ratifies and validates certain actions of school districts relating to the filing of final building project cost reports
Summary: Ratifies and validates certain actions of school districts relating to the filing of final building project cost reports, and directs the payment by the education department of state aid for school district building projects affected thereby.
ActClause: AN ACT to ratify and validate certain actions of school districts relating to the filing of final building project cost reports, and directing the payment of state aid for school district building projects affected thereby
